short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScrapeMaster by Merch.mba allows you to scrape and display listing information from the search page, optimizing time and effort!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ScrapeMaster by Merch.mba, a powerful Chrome extension for Amazon sellers. Easily scrape and view listing information from the search page, saving you time and effort. Compare products effortlessly and find the best item to sell on Amazon!

★ Display BSR, Added Date, ASIN, and Brand for each listing.
★ Highlight sold products in green and unsold products with a grey background.
★ Fast performance.
★ User-friendly interface.
★ Enable or disable any specific information.
★ Export all items on the search page as a CSV file.
★ Sort search results by BSR, Added Date and Best Sellers.
★ Display the number of sold items.

ScrapeMaster simplifies product research, putting all the data you need at your fingertips. Say goodbye to guesswork and start selling smarter today!
